item.title: Vodka for the People: The Booze that Makes Water Better
item.description:
Vodka for the People: The Booze that Makes Water Better

In the season of holiday parties and holiday drinking, we were glad to find a bottle of booze that does double duty. (It makes the night fun and the world better.) Elyx vodka's Tom Roberts tells us about their collaboration with Water for People, a leading water NGO that want to keep the world hydrated.

item.title: WanderWalt Club
item.description:
WanderWalt Club

THIS PLACE IS MEANT FOR

We plan it together and make things possible. To Join the club, you will have to find one of us and get referredÂ  by a Walt. Finding us is easy, we have lovers, seekers, dreamers, doers, bosses, employees, mentors, entrepreneurs, bikers, rockers and all sorts of Walts (as we call each other), brought together under one strict rule stop surviving and start living.
